title: What are the 10 most common countries of origin of legal US immigrants in the past 15 years? - Quora
tags: Immigration to the United States of America

response.answer_text: It might be hard to find data on the most recent year, but these things don't change a lot from one year to the next. Here is the number of legal immigrants per year for the 10 largest source countries of legal US immigrants for the 15 years 1999-2013:  Here are the totals by country. You can see these top 10 make up just less than 50% of all immigrants, and Mexico is the largest source of legal immigration (the 11th country, Korea, is shown separately in this chart).  These figures count the number of people who were granted legal permanent resident status (a "green card") in any given year. Typically many of these people would have arrived in the US many years before but they are counted here by the year when they were granted permanent residency. Source: U.S. Immigration Trends
